overview: The popular series is back, celebrating youth and beauty in a collection like no other. Cover models Eliza Ibarra and Naomi Swann are two best friends and co-workers both attracted to their newly divorced boss. Annoyed with Elizas grade-school flirting methods, Naomi decides to speed things up by diving in throat first. Also starring Blake Blossom, Jia Lissa & Lena Reif, and Nancy Ace in scorching performances of their own.
title: Young Fantasies 7
